gpalm:source:backup.description: This command will perform a full backup of a given orgs metadata, simply provide the org and a full backup of metadata will be pulled into provided project folder

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

targetusername.name: targetusername
targetusername.description: username or alias for the target org; overrides default target org

apiversion.name: apiversion
apiversion.description: override the api version used for api requests made by this command

packageversion.name: packageversion
packageversion.description: Version number that the package.xml should use in the retrieve call

outputdir.name: outputdir
outputdir.description: The directory where the source format should be output to

waittimemillis.name: waittimemillis
waittimemillis.description: The wait time between retrieve checks

ignoretypes.name: ignoretypes
ignoretypes.description: Comma seperated list of any additional types that you wish to ignore from the retrieve process, this can be used if the error "The retrieved zip file exceeded the limit of 629145600 bytes. Total bytes retrieved: 629534861" is recieved
